titleStmt.title: Miscellaneous discourses concerning the dissolution and changes of the world wherein the primitive chaos and creation, the general deluge, fountains, formed stones, sea-shells found in the earth, subterraneous trees, mountains, earthquakes, vulcanoes, the universal conflagration and future state, are largely discussed and examined / by John Ray ...
titleStmt.author: Ray, John, 1627-1705.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
